name: Winner Winner Live Arcade
description:
Take control of real, live claw machines on your mobile device and win real prizes that are shipped directly to you! Test your skills or just have fun on a huge variety of our arcade claw games.

With Winner Winner Arcade, you can:
* Play real claw games online on your mobile device through live video streaming
* Unlimited moves on all claw machines during game play
* Ship prizes directly to you
* Win some of your favorite prizes such as Funko Pop and Disney merchandise!
* Become a VIP to access free shipping and exclusive VIP claw machines
* Win tickets or exchange your prize for tickets to save up for bigger prizes

Gameplay Notes:
* For the best experience, please ensure you are on a high speed internet connection.
* The claw games you play control real mechanical claw machines. These machines can occasionally malfunction. Should you face an issue, please feel free to contact our support team at support@winnerwinner.com

Terms & Conditions: https://www.winnerwinner.com/terms/
Privacy Policy: https://www.winnerwinner.com/privacy/
EULA: https://www.winnerwinner.com/terms/#license
